name: post-companies-companyId-apiCredentials-apiCredentialId-generateApiKey
description:
Returns a new API key for the API credential. You can use the new API key a few minutes after generating it. The old API key stops working 24 hours after generating a new one.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”API credentials read and write

companyId.description: The unique identifier of the company account.

apiCredentialId.description: Unique identifier of the API credential.

$ul: **apiKey**: The generated API key.
